DOC.detailed_description: Population : Recruit study 24 pre-menopausal woman follow inclusion criterion : Age range 20 yr 50 yr , BMI > 30 kg/m2 < 55 kg/m2 Fasting glucose < 110 mg/dl 120 minute OGTT < 170 mg/dl glucose Design : The study design determine follow To compare effect high protein ( HP ) versus high carbohydrate ( HC ) diet energy restriction weight loss , body composition ( lean fat body mass ) bone mineral density free living patient set . To assess effect HP versus HC diet metabolic parameter include insulin sensitivity , protein muscle break , lipoprotein metabolism basal metabolic rate . Procedures : SCREENING VISIT 1 : Individuals fulfil inclusion exclusion criterion invite first screen visit ( VS1 ) . A brief study overview give along brief history physical examination , height weight measurement blood drawn chemistry profile Oral Glucose Tolerance Test ( OGTT ) determine normal glucose handling . SCREENING VISIT 2 ( VS2 ) : Individuals fulfil criterion contact invited second screening visit ( VS2 ) . Block food frequency questionnaire ass baseline dietary profile give along pre-study orientation help nutritionist . SCREENING VISIT 3 ( VS3 ) : At final screen visit ( VS3 ) food diary reviewed . Individuals randomize one two diet group use randomization table . Participants ask participate additional study euglycemic hyperinsulinemic clamp indirect calorimetry . Study participant either follow HP HC diet 6 month , food supply . Randomization perform use randomization table . HP diet base 30 % Kcals protein , 40 % Kcals carbohydrate ( CHO ) 30 % Kcals fat . In contrast , HC diet comprise 15 % Kcals protein , 55 % Kcals CHO 30 % Kcals fat . Subjects come weekly food pick weight check .
